param.name: Text
param.description: Enter your article text here. The 'Read more' button allows you to create a teaser text for your article. If the article has a 'Read more' break, only the text before the break will be displayed in the catalog/category view. In the item view the full text will be displayed.

param.name: Video
param.description: You can choose a video which will be displayed in the item view.

param.name: Related Articles
param.description: Choose related items. They will be displayed as l, which will be displayed as links to the specific item.
